title: Quiz 2 - Seating Arrangement
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following information carefully and answer the questions given below.

Twelve persons of an extended family are sitting in two parallel rows containing six persons each in such a way that there is equal distance between adjacent persons. In row 1 – R, S, T, U, V and W are seated and all of them are facing north and in row 2 – G, H, I, J, K and L are seated and all of them are facing south but not necessarily in the same order.

R is sister-in-law of S. R’s mother sits second to the left of R’s sister. J is married to V. Only one person sits between R’s sister and I’s father. U’s daughter-in-law does not sit at either extreme end of the row. U’s brother-in-law faces W. R’s brother-in-law sits third to the right of I’s son. G faces V. H sits on the immediate left of the one who faces I’s husband. I’s father sits third to the right of the one who faces the one who sits on the immediate left of I’s daughter-in-law. I’s sister-in-law sits fourth to the right of I’s husband.

T sits diagonally opposite the one who sits on the immediate left of L. R is daughter-in-law of U. Only four persons sit on the left of I. I’s son sits either on the immediate left or on the immediate right of the one who faces I. Only one person sits between I’s daughter and I’s son. H is married to W. I’s daughter-in-law sits third to the right of the one who faces the person who is on the immediate right of R’s sister. Only two persons sit between J and K. J does not sit at either extreme end of the row. G sits at one of the extreme ends of the row. L is an immediate neighbour of G. H is sister of R. K has three children. V is daughter-in-law of K, who is maternal grandfather of T. G is unmarried.

quiz.text: Who likes Volleyball?
options: The husband of Q
The father of Q
The daughter of P
Can’t be determined
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true?
options: P’s daughter sits on the immediate right of P.
Q’s husband sits third to the right of S.
U sits second to the right of her husband.
W and Q are immediate neighbours.
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is/are not true?
options: W – IOCL – Male – Football
S – BEL – Male – Tennis
Q – NIC – Female – Cricket
R – ONGC – Female – Hockey
Both [2] and [4]

quiz.text: How many persons sit between T’s mother-in-law and Q’s brother if counted in anticlockwise direction from T’s mother-in-law?
options: One
None
Two
Three
None of these

quiz.text: What is the position of P with respect to his wife?
options: Second to the right
Second to the left
Third to the left
Third to the right
None of these

quiz.text: Who is from Punjab?
options: J
N
O
K
L

quiz.text: Who amongst the following belongs to Haryana?
options: H
F
L
O
M

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true?
options: G is from Goa.
There are two persons between the one who is from Jharkhand and I.
H faces the one who is from Punjab.
The one who is from Odisha sits opposite the one who is from Assam.
All are true.

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way based on the their seating positions and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: I – Delhi
G – Odisha
O – Goa
K – Punjab
L – Assam

quiz.text: If ‘F’ is related to ‘Bihar’ and ‘H’ is related to ‘Manipur’ in a certain way based on their seating positions, who among the following is ‘K’ related to following the same pattern?
options: Odisha
Sikkim
Jharkhand
Delhi
Goa

quiz.text: Who among the following sits on the immediate right of the one who teaches Physics?
options: O
L
Q
N
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits third to the right of N?
options: O
R
L
S
Q

quiz.text: Who among the following sits exactly between O and M?
options: P
R
Q
L
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following teaches Civics?
options: O
M
L
S
Q

quiz.text: Who among the following sits third to the left of the one who teaches Biology?
options: The one who teaches Hindi
The one who teaches Civics
The one who teaches Sanskrit
The one who teaches Commerce
None of these

quiz.text: What is the marks of S?
options: 64
69
36
22
None of these

quiz.text: Who among the following sits on the immediate left of V?
options: U
V
T
S
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons are there between P and S, when counted from P in anti-clockwise directions?
options: Four
Two
Three
None
More than Five

quiz.text: Who among the following sits opposite the one whose marks is 52?
options: U
V
T
S
None of these

quiz.text: What is the difference between the marks of U and that of R?
options: 69
22
42
21
None of these

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is true?
options: H faces the one who sits second to the right of T’s wife.
Only one person sits between L and the one who faces T’s father.
W is on the immediate left of K’s daughter-in-law.
K is an immediate neighbour of G’s sister.
None of true.

quiz.text: Who among the following sit at the extreme ends of the row?
options: G, V, U, T
K, T, R, L
V, K, T, G
W, L, T, V
T, G, J, H

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and so form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: K, U
J, R
L, V
I, T
H, W

quiz.text: Who sits on the immediate right of the one who faces V’s husband?
options: The one who sits on the immediate right of J’s wife
The one who sits second to the right of I’s daughter
The one who faces T’s father
The one who faces the person who sits second to the left of I’s sister
None of these

quiz.text: How many persons are there between S’s father and R’s brother-in-law?
options: Two
Three
None
One
More than three
